item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

8. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (127 points | 36 comments)

19. FDA proposes ending use of oral phenylephrine as OTC nasal decongestant (183 points | 350 comments)

24. The case of a program that crashed on its first instruction (14 points | discuss)

26. Functional ultrasound through the skull (234 points | 79 comments)
27. Cops suspect iOS 18 iPhones are communicating to force reboots (92 points | 162 comments)

29. Mushroom Color Atlas (308 points | 30 comments)
